title: You don't have to be mad
creator_credit: Film Australia, Peter Johnson and Greg Reading
brief_description: Discusses what sort of people a psychologist can help, and how they can help them, especially in the employment field. Uses light-hearted as well as serious examples. Cast includes Bruce Spence, Graeme Blundell. Assistant producer, Rosemary Gow; director, script, Greg Reading; photographers, John Hosking, Ross King; editor, Tom Foley; sound, Lloyd Carrick, Rod Simmons; commentator, Paul Ricketts.
